source.name: 8.1 rephrase functionality

answers.answer: Allows the LLM to vary the wording of responses

source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify the purpose of the rephrase parameter in bot configuration
source.guidance: The correct answer is "Allows the LLM to vary the wording of responses." The `rephrase: true` parameter enables the LLM to dynamically adjust the wording of responses while maintaining the same meaning, providing more natural and varied interactions. The other options are incorrect: it doesn't affect memory functions, doesn't force exact text reproduction, and doesn't enable custom code functionality.
